ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Transport of DAVID HOFF of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a director of the Board of Directors of VIA Rail Canada Inc. to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective January 25, 2010.
